HeroDescription: Catalog is where creators share their thoughts, engage with others, and build meaningful connections. Join a community that values authentic conversations and quality content.
InteractiveEngagementDesc: Like and comment on posts to engage with the community. Build meaningful connections through authentic interactions.
RealtimeNotificationsDesc: Get instant alerts when someone reacts to your posts. Stay connected and never miss important interactions.
PersonalProfileDesc: Manage your posts, track engagement, and customize your profile. Full control over your content and presence.
PublicBrowseModeDesc: Explore all posts even without an account. Discover amazing content before deciding to join the community.
ContentManagementDesc: Create, edit, and unpublish your posts with ease. Maintain full ownership and control of your content.
RichDiscussionsDesc: Dive deep into conversations with detailed post pages and threaded comments for meaningful discussions.
FeaturesDescription: Powerful features designed to make sharing and discovering content effortless and engaging.
CTADescription: Start sharing your ideas, discover amazing content, and connect with like-minded creators today.
BrandDescription: Building communities through authentic conversations and meaningful connections. Share your story, discover new perspectives.

hero.title: Help
hero.description: Find answers to common questions, learn how to use our platform, and get the support you need.

getting_started.title: Getting Started
getting_started.description: Learn the basics of creating and managing your catalogs.

community_support.title: Community Support
community_support.description: Connect with other users and get help from the community.

contact_support.title: Contact Support
contact_support.description: Need direct help? Reach out to our support team.

create_catalog.question: How do I create my first catalog?
create_catalog.answer: To create a catalog, navigate to your dashboard and click 'Create New Catalog'. Fill in the required information like title, description, and category. You can then start adding entries to organize your content.

collaborate.question: Can I collaborate with others on catalogs?
collaborate.answer: Yes! You can invite other users to collaborate on your catalogs. Go to your catalog settings and use the 'Invite Collaborators' feature to add team members with different permission levels.

make_public.question: How do I make my catalog public?
make_public.answer: In your catalog settings, you can change the visibility from 'Private' to 'Public'. Public catalogs can be discovered and viewed by anyone on the platform.

content_types.question: What types of content can I add to catalogs?
content_types.answer: You can add various types of content including text entries, images, links, documents, and rich media. Each entry can have metadata, tags, and descriptions to help organize your content.

search.question: How do I search for specific content?
search.answer: Use the search bar at the top of the page to find catalogs, entries, or users. You can filter results by category, date, or content type to narrow down your search.

export.question: Can I export my catalog data?
export.answer: Yes, you can export your catalog data in various formats including JSON, CSV, or PDF. Go to your catalog settings and look for the 'Export' option.

support.title: Still Need Help?
support.description: Can't find what you're looking for? Our support team is here to help you with any questions or issues.

hero.description: Connect with like-minded individuals, share your knowledge, and be part of a growing community that values collaboration and creativity.

why_join.title: Why Join Our Community?
why_join.description: Discover the benefits of being part of our collaborative platform.

connect.title: Connect with Others
connect.description: Join a vibrant community of creators, curators, and enthusiasts sharing knowledge and ideas.

discussions.title: Rich Discussions
discussions.description: Engage in meaningful conversations about content, share feedback, and collaborate on projects.

support.title: Support & Recognition
support.description: Show appreciation for quality content and get recognized for your contributions to the community.

global.title: Global Network
global.description: Connect with people from around the world who share your interests and passions.

respectful.title: Be Respectful
respectful.description: Treat all community members with respect and kindness.

quality.title: Share Quality Content
quality.description: Contribute meaningful and well-organized content to the catalogs.

collaborate.title: Collaborate
collaborate.description: Work together to improve content and help others succeed.

hero.title: Privacy
hero.description: We value your privacy and are committed to protecting your personal information. Learn how we collect, use, and safeguard your data.

data_protection.title: Data Protection
data_protection.description: We use industry-standard security measures to protect your personal information.

minimal_collection.title: Minimal Collection
minimal_collection.description: We only collect data that is necessary to provide and improve our services.

secure_storage.title: Secure Storage
secure_storage.description: Your data is encrypted and stored securely with limited access controls.

user_control.title: User Control
user_control.description: You have control over your data and can request access, updates, or deletion.

information_collect.title: Information We Collect
information_collect.content: Content you create and share on the platform
information_collect.usage_data: Usage data and analytics to improve our services
information_collect.communication: Communication data when you contact us

how_we_use.title: How We Use Your Information
how_we_use.provide_services: To provide and maintain our catalog services
how_we_use.personalize: To personalize your experience on the platform
how_we_use.communicate: To communicate with you about updates and features
how_we_use.improve: To improve our services and develop new features

data_sharing.title: Data Sharing
data_sharing.description: We do not sell your personal information. We may share data only in these limited circumstances:
data_sharing.protect_rights: To protect our rights and prevent fraud
data_sharing.service_providers: With service providers who help us operate the platform

questions.title: Questions About Privacy?
questions.description: If you have any questions about this privacy policy or how we handle your data, please don't hesitate to contact us.
